column1: 234599,Physiologist,,"Analyse data to determine effectiveness of treatments or therapies
column3: Provide health and wellness advice to patients, program participants or caregivers
column5: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column11: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column13: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column15: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column17: Demonstrate activity techniques or equipment use
column21: Train patients, family members or caregivers in techniques for managing disabilities or illnesses
column27: Test biological specimens to gather information about patient conditions
column29: Advise athletes, coaches, or trainers on exercise regimens, nutrition, or equipment use
column31: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column33: Test patient heart or lung functioning
column35: Measure the physical or physiological attributes of patients
column37: Train caregivers or other non-medical staff
column43: Order medical diagnostic or clinical tests
column45: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
column47: Communicate health and wellness information to the public
